page.title: 13RECREATIONAL VISITS
page.content: First we arrive at the tramway.This Tramway has been open for over 100 years it is owned by the British trolly bus associotion.Secondly we will visit The Old Glen House.This has been open for 400 years.Firstly it was a hotel but a few years ago it got cleaned out and was changed into a pub it is very nice.Nextly we will visit the Wardens Centre this will tell you all about the moors and the birds and insects you can find on it,after that we will visit the Cup and Ring Stones.These are the most interesting thing on the moor.People think they are maps but we dont really know.Finally we will visit the Bellpits.These historic mines are mines that have been used for coal mining and then collapsed to make the pits.This is the end of our tour.
